Text: Insanely high resolution.  Please post a low-res version (under 720p) as well...
The filesize is only 2GB for 1080p. This is just a little higher than normal MVGroup 1.72GB (4000Kbps) 59 minutes files. Try getting a faster unlimited broadband connection.

If you want small files try downloading the BBC MP4 files using get_iplayer.

The 640x360 size is 340Mbytes.
The 832x468 size is 640Mbytes.
